radiographic_examinations.findings: Cholelithiasis without evidence of obstruction. The common bile duct measures up to 8 mm with a focal filling defect consistent with choledocholithiasis. No intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Clear lung bases. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Homogeneous enhancement of the liver, no focal liver mass, non-cirrhotic background. Normal pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys. No hydronephrosis. Small sliding-type hiatus hernia. Normal caliber of small and large bowel. No retroperitoneal or mesenteric adenopathy. No abdominal aortic aneurysm.
